paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted two BRCA2 variants with clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report the case of a 65-year-old Brazilian female patient who had previously been diagnosed with metastatic lung carcinoma carrying a BRCA2 mutation...

functional_data.summary: Results in a frameshift, leading to a truncated and non-functional BRCA2 protein.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with a high risk of breast and ovarian cancer.
key_quotes: the original mutation (p.Val220Ilefs4) led to a frameshift, culminating in the production of a truncated and non-functional BRCA2 protein.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing revealed the presence of two distinct BRCA2 gene mutations in the breast tumor.

functional_data.summary: Restores the reading frame of BRCA2, allowing for proper function.

variants.additional_notes: This mutation is considered a reversion mutation that reinstates BRCA2 functionality.
key_quotes: the second mutation, K437fs22, rectified the reading frame of exon 11.

tables_processed.table_caption: Foundation One results from the primary lung adenocarcinoma, primary breast adenocarcinoma, and germinative panel for cancer predisposition

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
